mention_address: "Old Town Trail, Clovis, Fresno County, California, 93612, United States of America"
attraction_reviewComments: This town is lovely. A great place to walk around & take in the area. Great shops, great restaurants & friendly people.

Beautiful downtown area with plenty of shops and restaurants. The streets and sidewalks were clean and well-kept.
Old town Clovis is a delight. The cafes, shopping, and lovely walks are delightful. We loved the Mexican café. The food was delicious and the service excellent.
Lovely shops, antiques, food and perfect people watching little town with coffee shops and restaurants. Lovely to stroll through
